description: After finding a great team of colleagues, I've created two companies that provide people with resources that allow them to solve the problems that they're passionate about!

orgs.name: advancing innovative minds
orgs.description: Advancing Innovative Minds (AIM) was UNC Charlotte's most active and dedicated entrepreneurial club. We used the booming development of the Charlotte area as a catalyst to create truly effective ideas to culminate into thriving businesses.

orgs.name: youxpert
orgs.description: YouXpert was a User Experience and Software Engineering Design Team that specialized in crafting products based on you and your customers preferences. We worked hard to deliver beautiful, coherent software product/website solutions that amplify your customer's voice.

description: Volunteering for community service is one of my favorite ways to contribute to social causes driectly

orgs.name: code2040
orgs.description: CODE2040 is a community of Black and Latinx technologists and their allies who are diversifying tech to create a more equitable, inclusive, and prosperous economy.

orgs.name: national society of black engineers
orgs.description: The National Society of Black Engineers' mission is to increase the number of culturally responsible Black engineers who excel academically, succeed professionally, and positively impact the community.
